text_block_list.name: Television
text_block_list.text: 『A place where the dreams of many Uma Musume lies, The Twinkle Series! Just who will be the one to leave their name at that summit――!』

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: That stage, was a faraway place that we all admired.

text_block_list.name: Laid-back Girl
text_block_list.text: Amazing, amazing! Those Uma Musume are so fast! They go whoosh just like the wind!

text_block_list.name: Brusque Man
text_block_list.text: As expected, the intensity of the Twinkle Series is different! Hey, Cameraman! Focus more on the ones in front!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Out in the sticks where there's not much to do, the TV seemed to show a bright and vivid scene. Everyone would say it's almost like 『Another World』.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: But that's wrong, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: That place is under the same sky. It's just really far away, for now.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: That's why, I will――!

text_block_list.name: Scout-seeking Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: What's my dream, is it? Of course, it's to win races! If they're an Uma Musume, then I think they'd all say the same thing.
Let's aim for the top together.
My dream is to guide an Uma Musume to win G1s and defeat famous Uma Musume from around the world――
choice_data_list: I want to be that kind of Trainer

text_block_list.name: Scout-seeking Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: I see, I guess a Trainer would have that kind of dream. You're free to have big dreams like that. Let's both do our best! See ya!
……I had intended to scout her, but, it seems she didn't think I was serious.
choice_data_list: ……Too big of a dream, I guess.

text_block_list.text: A new trainer talking about big dreams. No matter how serious I am, I guess it just looks unrealistic from others' perspective.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: HaaaAAAAAA!!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa……haa……

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: ……damn. I guess that wasn't enough…… Haa……was that last attack too shallow? ……Huu!
I wonder just how long she had been running. There was already so much sweat pouring down her face.
It wasn't that she was showing amazing speed, nor was she showing enough strength to line up with the others.
It was as if she was just letting her power run wild, a feverish run.
But why was it? I couldn't take my eyes off of her. It was like she was chasing something with an unquenchable fire――

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Haa-……! Alright. I can still keep going. This isn't all I've got――

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: What a run……! Excuse me, can we talk for a bit!?

text_block_list.name: Nervous-looking Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: S-so cool~……! So this is what a real run feels like…… Um, can I talk to you too……
She noticed the commotion and turned to look. There, there were many trainers and Uma Musume, and――

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: ……Huu. Sorry, I haven't run enough yet. I feel bad, but it'll have to wait for next time. See ya.
That Uma Musume retreated from the people around her and kept running on the course. Judging by their attention, she must be an Uma Musume of some acclaim.
But, for me――I turned my gaze back towards the earlier Uma Musume. But she wasn't there anymore……

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa, haa……!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: ……Hahaa! That fierce gaze I've been feeling……

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Shaaaaaaaa!!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: So it was you? Katsuragi Ace.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Yo, C.B.ー……! You seem bored, huh? Haa……shall I accompany you!?

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Is that an invite for some parallel running? I was thinking of taking a quick shower and then going for a walk though――

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Haa……Hehe, but you're in, right?

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: ……sounds good, let's play!
I moved to a place I could see both of them running clearly. As the noise grew, there was a change in the running of the two.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Oooh, what intensity……! She's pulling further away from her opponent!

text_block_list.name: Nervous-looking Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Amazing……C.B.ーsan, it's like she's cutting through the wind…… Katsuragi Ace-san can't keep up!
It was a run almost like a real race. But only one Uma Musume was the center of attention――

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: The was a wonderful run! Mr. C.B., please let me be the one to instruct you! With me, you'll be on the road to victory!

text_block_list.name: Mr. C.B.
text_block_list.text: Ahaha. I'll gladly accept just those feelings. Sorry, but I need to get going.

text_block_list.name: Nervous-looking Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Ah, C.B.ーsan!
Everyone that had gathered followed after Mr. C.B. and left. And then――

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Haa, haa……cough, haa……haa……
The one standing there with ragged breath――

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Damn……haa, haa…… As I thought, I lost, huh……damnit……!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Haa……I guess, trying to escape from that position…… against C.B.……haa, haa……haa……
Just being able to finish the race after that run was great. But even still, there will be frustration.
Should I just comfort her with 『Do your best next time』? Even if I wasn't her trainer, I probably shouldn't leave her on her own if she was feeling down――

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Haa……everyone's turning their backs on me……

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: They're underestimating me, huh. No, I'm not even on their radar? ……I guess that's expected.

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: ――Hahaa! I'll show them, for sure……!! Just watch me, this is the only time you'll be able to keep laughing!

text_block_list.name: Katsuragi Ace
text_block_list.text: Someday…… it'll be all of you chasing after my back……!
